job.title: Enterprise Data, AI, and Machine Learning Architect
job.industry: Marketing and Advertising,Computer Software,Hospital & Health Care
job.description: Our reliability is one of the best in the nation and were working to make it even better We live here too Thats why were committed to making Florida a better place Join our team todaybrPosition Specific DescriptionbrPosition Specific DescriptionbrAt NextEra Energy we are investing heavily in AIML efforts and enterprise data platform We are looking for a senior program manager to lead several strategic AIML projects to optimize the business operation excellence in Power Delivery from Image Detection Outage prediction to Storm Damage Forecast and Resource Optimization In this role the candidate will lead a few agile teams and partner business product owners data scientists and technical architects to offer the best solution delivery The ideal candidate shall have seasonal Agile projectprogram management skill who enjoys innovative AI digital technology solution and business transformation The candidate shall also be comfortable with big data strategy and cloud technologies The candidate must be selfdirected and comfortable supporting the AI amp data needs of multiple teams systems and productsbrSpecificJob FunctionsbrYou will be adding value by hands on as well as supervise a team of data analyst and developers from Enterprise Data Architecture perspective to design and write scripts and processes that manage the data extraction transformation movement loading cleansing and updating of dataYou will use your solutionsoriented approach and high work ethic along with excellent communication and process management skills to mentor internal customers and teammates on datalake technology and data modeling practicesbrThorough understanding of AWS or Cloud based Data Lake Data Pipeline Architecture amp Ecosystem leveraging AWS technologybrKeen to innovative digital solutions utilizing AIML technologybrComfortable with analytics tools that utilize the data pipeline to provide actionable insights into areas related to customer service systemsbrExperience in installing configuring and maintaining enterprise data environmentbrExperience in Geospatial network topology data architecture and applicationsbrExperience with image detection IoT APM and various AIML technology platformsbrBuild the infrastructure required for optimal extraction transformation and loading of data from a wide variety of data sources using NoSQL and SQL AWS big data technologies Dynamo Kinesis S3 HIVESparkbrExperience with Batch data loading using Talend Hive or Spark and HivebrExperience with realtime data ingestion using Kafka Spark and HbaseMongo DBbrKnowledge of Enterprise Software Platforms including Salesforce SAP Mulesoft middlewarebrServe as liaison between technical and nontechnical departmentsbrCommunicate with other management developers product managers and technical support specialists on product issuesbrExcellent in business partnership and leadership skillsbrbrstronguPreferred Specific Qualificationsbrbrustrong10 years of experience in technology projectprogram management who attained a Graduate degree in Computer Science ComputerElectrical Engineering Statistics Informatics Information Systems or another quantitative fieldbrExperience with big data or AI initiativesbrUnderstands big data and cloud tools AWS S3 Dynamo Athena EC2 EMR RDS Redshift Snowflake Power BI etcbrUnderstands objectorientedobject function scripting languages Python Java Scala etcbrAWS handson experience and AWS cloud architect or big data certification a plusbrExperience building and optimizing big data data pipelines architectures and data sets is a plusbrExcellent communication skillbrExperience with utility power business is a plusbrStrong leadership skill with team management experiencebrStrong team player with experience of leading or supervising technical resourcesbrbrstronguJob OverviewbrbrustrongThis position establishes strategy develops business plans and oversees and leads in the design development and implementation of technology solutions to meet business needs Leaders in this role provide leadership and oversight to manage performance and results in one or more Information Technology IT disciplines Individuals will be accountable for the reliability performance security and continuity of IT systems and supported business processesbrbrstronguJob Duties amp ResponsibilitiesbrbrustrongProvides leadership influence vision and direction to the organization to contribute to achieving the companys goalsbrWorks with IT leaders to develop overall IT strategy in alignment with business strategybrOversees value stream by focusing on cost and risks of technology portfolio to meet business needsbrSupports and fosters innovative technologies to deliver new ideas that enable business transformationbrEnsures high levels of ongoing system and application performance in production environmentsbrOversees development of processes and tools to automate code releases from development to operations DevOpsbrAttracts develops and retains a highperforming and diverse teambrEstablishes and drives technology roadmaps that align with current and future business needsbrManages third party technical and outsourcing relationships to deliver project and operational support objectivesbrEnsures technology processes are conducted in line with applicable standards and company policiesbrPerforms other jobrelated duties as assignedbrbrstronguRequired QualificationsbrbrustrongHigh School Grad  GEDbrBachelors or Equivalent ExperiencebrExperience 7 yearsbrbrstronguPreferred QualificationsbrbrustrongBachelors DegreebrSupervisorManagement Experience 2 yearsbrEmployee Group ExemptbrEmployee TypeFull TimebrJob Category Information
